text: Exhibition of meteorites in the museum. The National Museum of Brazil collections include an exhibition of meteorites discovered in Brazil and other countries. One of the most important meteorites that was on display is the Bendegó meteorite, which weighs over 5,000 kg and was discovered in 1784. It survived the fire that destroyed the museum in 2018, sustaining no major damage. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Image ! Name ! Type ! Find location ! Year ! TKW ! title: Collection of meteorites in the National Museum of Brazil
